mapper.select: SELECT pro.id, pro.process_name AS processName, u.LOGIN_ID AS creator, uu.LOGIN_ID AS currentHandler, pro.create_date AS createDate, pro.`code`, pro.code_name AS codeName, run.create_date AS handleDate, pro.state FROM oa_process pro LEFT JOIN oa_process_run run ON pro.id = run.process_id LEFT JOIN tb_sys_user u ON pro.create_by = u.id LEFT JOIN tb_sys_user uu ON pro.assignee = uu.id LEFT JOIN oa_flow_model md ON md.id = pro.flow_model_id where 1 = 1 and md.`status` = 1 and run.user_id = #{userId} AND pro.process_name like concat("%",#{processName},"%") and pro.create_date >= #{startTime} and pro.create_date <= #{endTime} and u.LOGIN_ID like concat("%",#{creator},"%") and pro.state = #{state} GROUP BY pro.id ORDER BY pro.create_date DESC
mapper.delete: delete from oa_process_run where process_id = #{processId} and user_id = #{userId}
